content: when you were younger did you ever play the game mushroom or fairy house i certainly did these adorable mushrooms are worked in the round on dpns they are knit in one piece which makes finishing a breeze simply add a touch of embroidery for the spots doors and windows how to videos included hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha > **praise for mushroom or fairy house** > > pattern was perfect > gigiginny 1 > > fun fun fun thrsedge 2 > > easy fun and really quick > minnistitcher 3 > > made a bunch so cute > deannadarling 4 > > pattern quick fun and well written > bonewoman 5 > > brilliantly written clear words & > photos randyratcrafts 6 > > the pattern is wonderful so > well-written and i loved the photos > provided mallacrochet 7 > > this is so cute 5kittens 8 > > cute & quick pattern kayrun 9 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/gigiginny/mushroom-or-fairy-house 2 https //www ravelry com/people/thrsedge 3 https //www ravelry com/people/minnistitcher 4 https //www ravelry com/people/deannadarling 5 https //www ravelry com/people/bonewoman 6 https //www ravelry com/people/randyratcrafts 7 https //www ravelry com/projects/mallacrochet/mushroom-or-fairy-house 8 https //www ravelry com/projects/5kittens/mushroom-or-fairy-house-2 9 https //www ravelry com/projects/kayrun/mushroom-or-fairy-house
